how_to_play.title: How to Play
how_to_play.description: Learn the basic rules and flow of the game.
instructions: Players take turns playing one card per round.
Special cards trigger unique effectsâ€”refer to the card guide.
The game ends when one player runs out of cards.
The player with the highest score wins.

how_to_use_app.title: How to Use the App
how_to_use_app.description: Learn how to navigate and use the application interface.
instructions: Launch the app from the Start menu or desktop shortcut.
Select your preferred instruction language from the settings menu.
Use the buttons at the bottom of the screen to play cards.
Click the help icon to view instructions at any time.
Exit the game by clicking 'Quit' or closing the window.
